channel.title: Adding make over mage?
channel.description:
Hello moparscapians! I have been trying to prep my server to go online when I realize that my server doesn't have the make over mage (you think i would have though about this first but yah lol) I have the npc for the make over mage but when I go to him and it opens up the screen to edit your character non of the buttons do anything. I edited an account to tell me the action buttons they use but it doesn't tell me so im assuming that it doesn't have any. Any help would be great.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/zlp7wm.jpg[/img]
I thought about this for a while to see if there was a way I could get the action classes for the buttons myself because i know that this is coded in because it shows that it is in the cache by the upper left. I would love any help from the moparscape I have come to know and love. Feel better soon deathschaos9!
Update: I found out that the interface id is 3559

item.title: Adding make over mage?
item.dc:creator: @runemaker runemaker
item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

Do you think my players would be happy with a random character generator? I set it up so that if you do ::male it gives you a male with random clothes and hair + color and ect… and the same for female. Think they will be ok with this?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding make over mage?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

u edited a packet in your client, causing it to show the character wearing armor for that interface, instead of having it in a different packet being called only by the equipment interface

your better off just not having it, its rarely used + more work then its worth

Read full topic
